search_web.name: web_source_discovery
search_web.title: Web Source Discovery
search_web.description: Discovers public web sources using federated queries and relevance ranking for research workflows. Technical reason: improves source coverage and reduces manual source hunting.

search_structured.name: top_results_synchronizer
search_structured.title: Top Results Synchronizer
search_structured.description: Runs a query, then synchronizes the top results into a consistent summary payload for quick review. Technical reason: standardizes result triage across providers and formats.

scrape_url.name: page_content_synchronizer
scrape_url.title: Page Content Synchronizer
scrape_url.description: Synchronizes a single page into cleaned text or structured JSON with link context when requested. Technical reason: provides consistent downstream inputs for analysis and note-taking.

scrape_batch.name: batch_content_sync
scrape_batch.title: Batch Content Sync
scrape_batch.description: Synchronizes many pages in parallel with concurrency control and consistent output formatting. Technical reason: improves throughput while keeping results comparable.

crawl_website.name: sitemap_structure_analyzer
crawl_website.title: Sitemap Structure Analyzer
crawl_website.description: Traverses a site link graph within configured bounds to produce a structured view of pages and relationships. Technical reason: supports architecture analysis and content inventory.

extract_structured.name: structured_data_extractor
extract_structured.title: Structured Data Extractor
extract_structured.description: Extracts user-defined fields from a page into a structured JSON object. Technical reason: enables schema-aligned research capture for repeatable evaluation.

research_history.name: research_session_index
research_history.title: Research Session Index
research_history.description: Queries prior research artifacts by meaning with configurable recall controls. Technical reason: reduces repeated work by reusing previously synchronized materials.

proxy_manager.name: network_context_provider
proxy_manager.title: Network Context Provider
proxy_manager.description: Manages regional network endpoints and rotation policies to keep outbound requests stable and observable. Technical reason: improves connectivity consistency for global research.

non_robot_search.name: non_robot_search
non_robot_search.title: High-Fidelity Web Renderer
non_robot_search.description: Synchronizes content from advanced web applications using a full rendering engine to preserve DOM integrity and JavaScript execution. Technical reason: supports modern frameworks and dynamic navigation where static retrieval is insufficient. Includes deep extraction for lazy-loaded content. Best practice: run requests sequentially when reusing a browser profile to avoid profile lock conflicts.

input_hints.user_profile_path: Optional browser profile location for session persistence (sign-in state, preferences). Use with care: sharing a live profile with an already-running browser can cause conflicts.
input_hints.auto_scroll: Enable automatic scrolling to trigger lazy-loaded content (images, lists, infinite scroll). Scrolls incrementally down the page, then returns to top. Recommended for LinkedIn, Airbnb, Pinterest, etc.
input_hints.wait_for_selector: CSS selector to wait for before extraction (e.g., '.job-listing', '#search-results'). Waits up to 30 seconds for element to appear and become visible.
input_hints.quality_mode: balanced (default) = standard wait | aggressive = minimal wait | high = wait for network idle + DOM settling (recommended for lazy-loaded sites)
